AboutMyself.Text: - Hello, I'm Ramadan./-  Web Developer./-  Full Stack (MERN)./,- Web Developer, Full Stack (MERN)./

SiteDefinition.Title: Site Definition
SiteDefinition.Description: It is an affiliate marketing website that showcases home products, clothing, outdoor products, and electrical appliances.

ImportantPoints.Title: Important Points
ImportantPoints.ControlPanel: Control Panel: Displays statistics and reports on orders and commissions.
ImportantPoints.ProductManagement: Product Management: Add, edit, and view products with details like name, price, images, and description.
ImportantPoints.OrderManagement: Order Management: View order details such as customer name, address, quantity, and price, along with tracking the order status.
ImportantPoints.ShoppingCart: Shopping Cart: View products added to the cart with options to edit or remove them.
ImportantPoints.Support: Support: Provide means of communication with the support team via WhatsApp and Facebook.
ImportantPoints.OrderForm: Order Form: Enter order details such as customer name, phone number, address, quantity, and shipping price.
ImportantPoints.DetailsPage: Details Page: Display product details such as name, images, price, commission, shipping, and description.

ProjectDetails.Title: Technologies Used
ProjectDetails.Description: Uses the latest technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit to build fast and efficient interfaces with robust state management and seamless server interaction.

Technologies._2: Tailwind CSS for styling and design.

ProjectImages.Title1: Some pictures from the control panel (admin)

SiteDefinition_2.Title: Site Definition
SiteDefinition_2.Description: It is a story management system that tracks the status of stories through various production stages such as cutting, back, chest, assembly, storage, washing, packing, and final storage.

ImportantPoints_2.Title: Important Points
ImportantPoints_2.AdminPage: Allows the admin to add the cuts (work) to the site and monitor their status. The admin can enter details such as work order, model number, quantity, name, status, received settings, notes, last update time, and supervisor name.
ImportantPoints_2.SupervisorPage: Allows supervisors to update the status of the cuts and add notes. The status includes stages such as cutting, back, front, assembly, storage, laundry, packing, and final storage. The supervisor's name and update time are recorded.
ImportantPoints_2.SearchFunctionality: Allows users to search for cuts by name, quantity, work order, or model number.

Project_2_Details.Title: Technologies Used
Project_2_Details.Description: Uses the latest technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit to build fast and efficient interfaces with robust state management and seamless server interaction.

Technologies._2: Tailwind CSS for styling and design.
